title: Thomas Piketty: Quality of Life for Billions of People is at Stake
itunes:title: Thomas Piketty: Quality of Life for Billions of People is at Stake
description: World-renowned economist and inequality researcher Thomas Piketty in conversation with Rob Johnson, about Piketty’s just-released book, A Brief History of Equality.
